title: Erigon/Prysm combination not working (no terminal total difficulty)
body:

# üêû Bug Report

### Description

<!-- ‚úçÔ∏è--> A clear and concise description of the problem...
Prysm-Erigon combo doesn't work on mainnet:
```
ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=the execution layer doesn't have a terminal total difficulty. expected: 0xc70d808a128d7380000: client error while processing request
```

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

Not on mainnet.

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

Start latest Erigon (v2022.09.01):
```
/usr/local/bin/erigon --datadir /data/erigon --chain mainnet --http.port 8545 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts "*" --http.api eth,engine,erigon,trace --authrpc.jwtsecret=/data/jwt/jwtsecret 
```

Start latest Prysm (3.1.1):
```
/app/prysm/bin/beacon-chain-v3.1.1-linux-amd64     --accept-terms-of-use     --datadir=/data/prysm     --execution-endpoint=${EXECUTION_ENDPOINT} --jwt-secret=/data/jwt/jwtsecret
```
I tried to add difficulty override to both Erigon and Prysm, in both hex and decimal format.
I tried to download genesis.ssz for mainnet and use it in the command. No success.

## üî• Error
```
 ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=the execution layer doesn't have a terminal total difficulty. expected: 0x0: client error while processing request
[2022-09-15 11:26:23]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2022-09-15 11:26:28]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2022-09-15 11:26:33]  WARN powchain: Execution client is not syncing
[2022-09-15 11:26:33] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=the execution layer doesn't have a terminal total difficulty. expected: 0x0: client error while processing request
[2022-09-15 11:26:33]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2022-09-15 11:26:38]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2022-09-15 11:26:43] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=the execution layer doesn't have a terminal total difficulty. expected: 0x0: client error while processing request
```

## üåç  Your Environment

**Operating System:**
Linux
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**
3.1.1

**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**
The same setup works on Ropsten and Sepolia.
Some users say [here](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/5370) that they were able to run Erigon with another consensus client.
It seems to have been an issue with my Erigon. See my comments in the other ticket.
